name: Empty Desert (Wagon Road)
description: A narrowing stretch of dusty wagon road, hinting at the vast, unforgiving wilderness beyond. The path here is faint, a mere suggestion of passage across the vast, indifferent desert. The wagon road continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a testament to the endless expanse of the undeveloped frontier. To the west, a vacant lot marked by surveyor's stakes hints at future plans. The air is still, thick with dust and the scent of dry sagebrush, broken only by the distant cry of a hawk, oblivious to the subtle grit of the west.
